amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 116-392 to increase Department of Energy technical assistance for the post-disaster recovery of electrical grids in U.S. territories by $3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 116-392 to increase Department of Energy technical assistance for the post-disaster recovery of electrical grids in U.S. territories by $3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Plaskett.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Plaskett amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
